title: Google pixel notifications - only receiving when connected to wifi
content: Until recently I was receiving notifications and alerts when connected to mobile network and WiFi, but I only know seem to get them when I connect to wifi where all notifications I should have received come through in one go.  I've tried searching through the help pages and Google but can't find anything to suggest how to fix it.  I'm not aware of anything I've selected either.  All apps are use have notifications enabled.  Any help appreciated!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
